contentList.content: Your body is as resilient as any armour. While not wearing armour, you add your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

Forged from blackened steel and reinforced with storm-weathered oak, this heavy chest bears the mark of a Spartan Storm Sorcerer. Its lid is secured by robust iron clasps, etched with subtle, angular lightning bolts that hint at the raw power contained within.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> maximum increases by 2 for each Sorcerer level.
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>" to the damage it deals.
